import axios from"axios";var BASE_URL="https://assigmentfs2.herokuapp.com/api";// const BASE_URL = "http://localhost:4000/api";
var LOGIN_API="".concat(BASE_URL,"/login");var USERS_API="".concat(BASE_URL,"/users");export var createUser=function createUser(user){return axios.post("".concat(USERS_API),user).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var findAllUsers=function findAllUsers(){return axios.get(USERS_API).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var findUserById=function findUserById(uid){return axios.get("".concat(USERS_API,"/").concat(uid)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var deleteUser=function deleteUser(uid){return axios.delete("".concat(USERS_API,"/").concat(uid)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var deleteUsersByUsername=function deleteUsersByUsername(username){return axios.get("".concat(USERS_API,"/username/").concat(username,"/delete")).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var findUserByCredentials=function findUserByCredentials(credentials){return axios.post("".concat(LOGIN_API),credentials).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var service={findAllUsers:findAllUsers};export default service;
